name: Shri
greetingText: I really like your name btw! ❤️
wishText: My One and Only, My Always and Forever
text1: You are the most beautiful part of my life, and the light that brightens my darkest days 💖✨
textInChatBox: I love you more than words, more than the stars in the sky, and more than anything in this world 🌍💗
text2: I promise to hold your hand through every step of life, to cherish you, to protect you, to support you in all your dreams, and to love you endlessly 💞♾️
text3: Every moment with you feels magical, and every day I spend with you reminds me of how lucky I am to have you ☺️💟
text4: Bae 🎀...   you're not just my girlfriend...   you're my best friend,   my soulmate...   and you are my
text5Entry: 💓I wish you a lifetime of joy, success, and endless love💓. May your days be filled with sunshine, your nights with sweet dreams, and your heart with pure bliss💓.
text5Content: Here’s to a lifetime of love, laughter, and happiness together👩‍❤️‍👨.
replayText: Click Here, If you want to watch it again.
